--- DateTime : 2021/04/14
--- Description : 眩晕
---

local helper = battle_helper
local table_names = tables

---@type battle_components
local battle_components = require(helper.path.battle_components)
---@type fsm_battle_base
local super = require(helper.path.battle_fsm .. 'fsm/fsm_battle_base')

---@class battle_fsm_dizzy : fsm_battle_base
local battle_fsm_dizzy = class("battle_fsm_dizzy", super)

---构造函数
---@protected
---@param context context
function battle_fsm_dizzy:ctor(context)
    super.ctor(self, table_names.BTLState.ids.BTLState_Dizzy, context)
end

---是否需要恢复该状态
---@public
---@return boolean
function battle_fsm_dizzy:is_need_restore()
    return true
end

---进入状态
---@protected
---@param entity entity
function battle_fsm_dizzy:enter_state(entity)
    entity:replace_component(battle_components.unit_action, table_names.RoleRes.properties.DizzyAction, true)
end

return battle_fsm_dizzy
